and a.order_id like '%'||#{orderId}||'%'

and pay_time >= to_date(#{timeStart}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and pay_time <= to_date(#{timeEnd}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') ) where buy_num > refund_num
